description: This header file defines utility functions within the Utils namespace for file synchronization and JSON settings persistence, including methods to synchronize file contents and persist JSON data to a file with synchronization.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes a file by opening it, flushing its buffer with fflush, calling fsync for disk synchronization, and then closing it.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists JSON settings to a specified file by loading the existing file, updating a JSON element, writing it back, and then synchronizing the file to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
